items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect black dress
items.body: I’m 5‘4“ 125 pounds. The small fit perfectly and was it good length. It’s also worked well with Cowboy boots. Read more
items.author: Z

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 100% recommended!!
items.body: If you are looking at this dress, buy it!! This dress is gorgeous!! The fabric is very soft and not see through at all. The length is perfect. I’m 5’1, 128 lbs and got a small. If you have a belly to hide like me, this dress does it too. I wore it to a company Holiday party and received a lot of compliments. Read more
items.author: Zalem

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flowy dress
items.body: Usually order XS and the small did not fit. Cute of you like flowy dress. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5’1

items.author: Hannah S

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Fit
items.body: So pretty and comfortable! The mesh makes it stretch and move with curves well without restricting you, and the fabric is soft. The ruffles are very cute, and help keep some modesty, especially when sitting. The slit in front goes a little high if you move the ruffles, so be a bit dainty when sitting Used the size chart in the listing and went a bit bigger in case the mesh didn't stretch a lot. It says large is 12-14, and I'm mostly a 10 (43in hips/bottom) and it fits comfortably and not loose Read more
items.author: Kevlar B Lightning

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: This is a stunning dress. Im 5'2 116pds. I ordered the small, and it fits perfectly. Read more
items.author: Leslie D

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi Ruched Bodycon Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi Ruched Bodycon Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Wine Red, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
